title: Audio representation - what it's all about
description: To classify audio, you first need present it somehow to the classifier. You may notice everyone is talking about spectrogram, FFT, STFT, MFCC, but why don't we just use audio? What does it all stand for? Here comes a little explanation!tip: most interesting things are marked as QUESTION
